Package sndlib.core.io

Interface Summary
SNDlibParser This interface provides the common methods to parse Networks, Models and Solutions.
SNDlibWriter This interface provides the common methods to write Networks, Models and Solutions.
 

Class Summary
SNDlibIOConverter Converts network, model and solution files written in one IO-format into any other IO-format.
SNDlibIOFactory This factory constructs SNDlibParsers and SNDlibWriters to be used to handle specific IO-formats of SNDlib.
SNDlibIOFormat This class represents a SNDlib IO format.
 

Exception Summary
SNDlibIOException This exception is the base type of all exceptions related to the IO-implementations of SNDlib.
SNDlibParseException This exception is thrown by classes related to parsing networks, models and solutions.
SNDlibWriteException This exception is thrown by classes related to writing networks, models and solutions.
